"It struck me more forcibly than I have ever received any impression that this was a race of men of strong nerves." is awkward and confusing.

"Even the poilus, having exhausted their first joy of reunion, sit down and examine their books, if they happen to be shopkeepers, or mend the furniture, or plow the fields." is awkward and confusing.

"I had a very good cup of tea and then went out and hired a cab by the hour, as I had a letter to the Préfet from M. Joseph Reinach and also wanted to see something of the town." is overly long and complex.
